About Me

Work

Dynamic Profile Generetor

Built With: JavaScript,HTML,CSS,ES6,Node

This is a practical CLI application which allows users to dynamically create a portfolio using node.js By answering a few simple questions in your terminal, node will generate a portfolio populated by the user's input.

Rate Your Employee

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, ES6, jQuery, Bootstrap

This is a custom application software created as a group to allow internal employers to provide feedback on employee's performance as well as keep track of this in a consistent manner.
